00019 template <class T>
00020 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Fortran_Array2D<T> &A)
00021 {
00022     int M=A.dim1();
00023     int N=A.dim2();
00024 
00025     s << M << " " << N << "\n";
00026 
00027     for (int i=1; i<=M; i++)
00028     {
00029         for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00030         {
00031             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00032         }
00033         s << "\n";
00034     }
00035 
00036 
00037     return s;
00038 }

00056 template <class T>
00057 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &s, Fortran_Array2D<T> &A)
00058 {
00059 
00060     int M, N;
00061 
00062     s >> M >> N;
00063 
00064         Fortran_Array2D<T> B(M,N);
00065 
00066     for (int i=1; i<=M; i++)
00067         for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00068         {
00069             s >>  B(i,j);
00070         }
00071 
00072         A = B;
00073     return s;
00074 }
